title: Where is TF, Liss, Elise nerf?
body:
But Riot still thinks they aren't competitive picks.They have other opinion.Better nerf Azir but meanwhile TF, Liss, Elise are viable competitive champions every time.Where is nerf? You nerfed Azir but you don't nerf this competitive champions.Where are your principles, rules? They are fine maybe but they are strong competitive picks so you must nerf them.

Worlds preparing but they don't nerf strong competitive picks.Interesting.

replies.body:
Lissandra builds somewhat beefy with items that besides giving AP, give HP or Mana or both. See {{item:3027}} It makes her slightly harder to kill, but if she uses her E to engage, she has to ult someone and W to disengage, which, unless she already has at least a 5 stack RoA will eat a lot of her mana away.

Twisted Fate is garbage right now. Unreliable pick unless global vision/stun bot is what you want.

Elise has been weakened a bit. People often pick her for the diving capability she has. But she only really has one reliable CC. Her cocoon. Building Rylai's on her helps her stick, but a gank can only be 100% successful if she lands her cocoon, which, be shocked, is a thin line skillshot and quite difficult to land because of that. Plus, she makes for an excellent frontliner if built with Cinderhulk+mix of AP/tank items.

Azir's ult nerf might have been too much, but the power curve nerf of his soldiers was well deserved when he can essentially pin someone down with double W+Q combo after Rylai's is bought. If anything, i´d rather have his Q nerfed instead of his ult.

> [{quoted}](name=SithesisLord,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VGbrdnkE,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-08-11T19:24:31.382+0000)
>
> Lissandra builds somewhat beefy with items that besides giving AP, give HP or Mana or both. See {{item:3027}} It makes her slightly harder to kill, but if she uses her E to engage, she has to ult someone and W to disengage, which, unless she already has at least a 5 stack RoA will eat a lot of her mana away.
> 
> Twisted Fate is garbage right now. Unreliable pick unless global vision/stun bot is what you want.
> 
> Elise has been weakened a bit. People often pick her for the diving capability she has. But she only really has one reliable CC. Her cocoon. Building Rylai's on her helps her stick, but a gank can only be 100% successful if she lands her cocoon, which, be shocked, is a thin line skillshot and quite difficult to land because of that. Plus, she makes for an excellent frontliner if built with Cinderhulk+mix of AP/tank items.
> 
> Azir's ult nerf might have been too much, but the power curve nerf of his soldiers was well deserved when he can essentially pin someone down with double W+Q combo after Rylai's is bought. If anything, i´d rather have his Q nerfed instead of his ult.

We should talk over numbers.Look last LCK, LPL games and Elise's p/b rate.

And?

Alistar had a 90.2% P/B rate but a negative winrate in the LCK. And a 83.2% P/B rate in the LPL. Both stats just during the spring season.

Odd that i haven´t seen you complain about him. Far from me to think he's OP. He's balanced, really.

LPL Spring Season stats:

>Lissandra: 55.3% P/B, with 61 games played, 64 games banned with a 59% WR.
>Elise: 37.6% P/B, with 77 games played, 8 games banned with a 42.9% WR.
>Twisted Fate: 28.8% P/B, with 18 games played, 47 games banned with a 72.2% WR.

LPL Summer Season stats:

>Lissandra: 27.1% P/B, with 9 games played, 4 games banned with a 66.7% WR.
>Elise: 25% P/B, with 10 games played, 2 games banned with a 20% WR.
>Twisted Fate: 20.8% P/B, with 6 games played, 4 games banned with a 83.3% WR.

___

Overall, Lissandra had a good, rather balanced run in the LPL, despite being banned 3 games more.

Elise barely had any pressure at all. Both seasons of the LPL ended with her having negative Win Rates.

TF spent a lot of games banned on a ratio of nearly 3 banned games for every played game. But most of the games played, he won.

Does that mean he deserves a nerf? Hardly.

In more ways than one, he's an opposite case to Garen. In which Garen is good in normal ranked queue but bad in competitive, while TF is bad in ranked, good in competitive because of the utility he brings.

A nigh global ult that grants vision on enemies then allows him to teleport, gold card in hand, ready to gank? That´s extremely useful in competitive.

Now let´s move on to the LCK.

___

LCK Spring Season stats:

>Lissandra: 64.2% P/B, with 70 games played, 68 games banned with a 48.6% WR.
>Elise: 59.1% P/B, with 117 games played, 10 games banned with a 50.4% WR.
>Twisted Fate: 38.6% P/B, with 27 games played, 56 games banned with a 66.7% WR.

LCK Summer Season stats:

>Lissandra: Not played or banned.
>Elise: 75.8% P/B, with 18 games played, 7 games banned with a 38.9% WR.
>Twisted Fate: 30.3% P/B, with 2 games played, 8 games banned with a 50% WR.

___

In the LCK, Lissandra had a good run again, with an average winrate.

Elise only did fairly in the Spring season, falling to a below average and honestly poor winrate in the summer season.

TF still more banned than picked, but winning most games played. Still not indicative that he needs nerfs.

And the fact that Riot has not informed us of any changes to them, nor have done it on the first 3 PBE patches most likely mean they will not be receiving any at least for 6.17, and probably might have something in wait for them in the Worlds patch, but then again, most likely not since they are fairly balanced for what they do.

Sources:

http://lol.esportspedia.com/wiki/LCK/2016_Season/Spring_Season/Statistics/Champions
http://lol.esportspedia.com/wiki/LCK/2016_Season/Summer_Season/Statistics/Champions
http://lol.esportspedia.com/wiki/LPL/2016_Season/Spring_Season/Statistics/Champions
http://lol.esportspedia.com/wiki/LPL/2016_Season/Summer_Season/Statistics/Champions

They nerfed Azir because he had a very safe lane with high damage output, and could snowball that into an oppressive endgame, which none of the champs you listed do. Being strong in competitive =/= broken and needs a nerf, its just that when things like that are oppressively strong, competitive players pick up on it and use them a lot, leading to Riot seeing how in need of nerfs the champs are, so they get nerfed, but it isn't a direct and binary correlation.

Are you kidding me?! Azir was ridiculous when he was good!

He had everything. Huge range, great mobility, excellent poke, strong laning, AND he was a late-game hypercarry.

It's sad he's dumpstered, but seriously, it was insane.

And Gragas has everything too.

I see Elise a lot less that Gragas, Rek'Sai, and Nidalee.

And I'm not defending my main.

She has everything but good teamfighting, and her jungle clear, while strong, isn't over the top like Nidalee's. 

She has potent ganks, strong mobility, CC, and damage. But she lacks a lot in teamfights and doesn't make up for that in pure early power, like I said before.

I guess if you really wanted a hard meta shift you could nerf her. Hell, she has a 49.77% win rate.

I'd say that's pretty balanced.

Is 6% difference very big?

No, I'm not watching LCK. I haven't for a while.

You don't see Viktor or Karma getting huge nerfs for Worlds, do you? Or Ryze and Trundle?

Those last 2 are way worse than Elise's 47% win rate.

What is meaning of meta change? Elise deserves nerf.

TF can be melted easily. I'm a Lissandra main, lvl 6, 95K.

Elise I agree with. she is very strong. and TF has a ton of burst damage. but I don't think Lissandra and TF can hold a candle to Illaoi and Morgana. Morgana has a 3 second stun and a spell shield, Illaoi can 1v5 at half health lvl 11+.

To be nurfed there has to be a mechanic with the champion that is actually broken. IMO Illaoi fits perfectly for and is long overdue for a nurf. Even early game her tentacles do so much damage and steal so much health, id suggest the percent lifesteal in ult and per tentacle be reduced. She will still be the solo carry everyone hates to see top lane, but at least there will be more options for fighting her other than move a lot and just hold lane the best you can. When will I be able to aggress illaoi from even ground early game?

Lissandra though, her cooldowns are pretty long on everything except for her Q. which is her spam/farm/harass. Its what makes her dominant. She doesn't do enough damage and definitely cannot 1v5 unless shes fed. TF, yeah he does a ton of damage and his stun is pretty crazy. but they made QSS for a reason fam.
